section.p:
You slip and fall, plunging with a short cry towards the hard icy ground below. It would mean certain doom if not for the fact that your fall is broken by a deep snowdrift. As it is you
lose 3-18 Stamina points
(the roll of three dice); you can subtract 1 from this if you are an initiate of the Three Fortunes.
If still alive, you pick yourself up and decide what to do next.
